Package com.kneelawk.codextra.api

Class Codextra

java.lang.Object
com.kneelawk.codextra.api.Codextra
public final class Codextra extends Object
Codextra DFU codec utility root class.

For Ops-Attachments, see AttachmentKey.

  • Method Details

    • errorHandlingMapCodec

      public static <R> com.mojang.serialization.MapCodec<Optional<R>> errorHandlingMapCodec(com.mojang.serialization.MapCodec<R> wrapped, Consumer<String> errorLogger, boolean succeedErrors)
      Creates a new MapCodec that catches decoding errors and logs them.
      Type Parameters:
      R - the result type.
      Parameters:
      wrapped - the codec to catch decoding errors from.
      errorLogger - the logger to log decoding errors to.
      succeedErrors - whether errors should be converted intl successes or just partials.
      Returns:
      the created map codec.

    • errorLoggingMapCodec

      public static <R> com.mojang.serialization.MapCodec<Optional<R>> errorLoggingMapCodec(com.mojang.serialization.MapCodec<R> wrapped, Consumer<String> errorLogger)
      Creates a new MapCodec that converts errors into successes but logs them.
      Type Parameters:
      R - the result type.
      Parameters:
      wrapped - the codec to catch decoding errors from.
      errorLogger - the logger to log decoding errors to.
      Returns:
      the created map codec.

    • keyCheckingMapCodec

      public static <O> com.mojang.serialization.MapCodec<Optional<O>> keyCheckingMapCodec(Collection<String> requiredKeys, com.mojang.serialization.MapCodec<O> wrapped)
      Creates a new MapCodec that checks for the presence of the given keys before attempting to decode.
      Type Parameters:
      O - the result type.
      Parameters:
      requiredKeys - the keys required before decoding can happen.
      wrapped - the map codec that does the decoding.
      Returns:
      the created map codec.

    • mapKeyDispatchCodecResult

      public static <K, V> com.mojang.serialization.MapCodec<V> mapKeyDispatchCodecResult(com.mojang.serialization.MapCodec<K> keyCodec, Function<? super V,? extends com.mojang.serialization.DataResult<? extends K>> keyGetter, Function<? super K,? extends com.mojang.serialization.DataResult<? extends com.mojang.serialization.MapCodec<? extends V>>> codec)
      Creates a new MapCodec that dispatches based on the value decoded from a different map codec.

      This is similar to the KeyDispatchCodec but allows for a map-codec key.

      Type Parameters:
      K - the key type.
      V - the value type.
      Parameters:
      keyCodec - the codec of the key type.
      keyGetter - a function for retrieving the key when given a value.
      codec - a function for retrieving the value codec when given a key.
      Returns:
      the created map codec.

    • mapKeyDispatchCodec

      public static <K, V> com.mojang.serialization.MapCodec<V> mapKeyDispatchCodec(com.mojang.serialization.MapCodec<K> keyCodec, Function<? super V,? extends K> keyGetter, Function<? super K,? extends com.mojang.serialization.MapCodec<? extends V>> codec)
      Creates a new MapCodec that dispatches based on the value decoded from a different map codec.

      This is similar to the KeyDispatchCodec but allows for a map-codec key.

      Type Parameters:
      K - the key type.
      V - the value type.
      Parameters:
      keyCodec - the codec of the key type.
      keyGetter - a function for retrieving the key when given a value.
      codec - a function for retrieving the value codec when given a key.
      Returns:
      the created map codec.

    • unitHandlingFieldOf

      public static <A> com.mojang.serialization.MapCodec<A> unitHandlingFieldOf(String name, com.mojang.serialization.Codec<A> codec)
      Creates a new MapCodec that treats missing keys as units (empty maps) so that they can be decoded by Codec.unit(Supplier).
      Type Parameters:
      A - the result type.
      Parameters:
      name - the field name.
      codec - the codec to go into the field.
      Returns:
      the created map codec.
